conclusion: Plan to calculate initial and final magnetic flux and find the change.
Image shows a rectangular coil ABCO aligned with the x-axis, rotating 60° around the z-axis.
Area of the coil ABCO is 0.4 m².
Magnetic induction intensity is B = 0.1 T.
Initial magnetic flux Φi is 0.04 Wb.
Final magnetic flux Φf after 60° rotation is 0.02 Wb.
Change in magnetic flux ΔΦ is -0.02 Wb.
Absolute change in magnetic flux is 0.02 Wb.
